about.details:
S A Tech Software India Limited was founded in 2012 and is an IT consulting subsidiary of the foreign corporation SA Technologies Inc, USA.

The company provides application development, mobile app development, cloud infrastructure, software quality assurance, generative AI, machine learning, IoT solutions, data science and analytics.

The product and services portfolio of S A Tech Software India includes:

  1. IT Services: The company provides technology services and digital transformation services to Fortune 500 clients, helping them conceptualize, design, develop and deliver better products. These include artificial intelligence and machine learning, software development and engineering, digital transformation and automation, cloud and DevOps services, quality assurance and testing, and the Global Capability Centre (GCC).
  2. Artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML)
  3. Data science and analytics
  4. Software development and engineering
  5. Digital transformation and automation
  6. Cloud and DevOps services
  7. Quality assurance and testing

As of September 30, 2023, the company had 356 employees.

faqs.question: What is the S A Tech Software India IPO?
faqs.answer:
S A Tech Software India IPO is a SME IPO of 3900000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹23.01 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹59 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on July 26, 2024, and closes on July 30, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in S A Tech Software India IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in S A Tech Software India IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in S A Tech Software India IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in S A Tech Software India IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'S A Tech Software India IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When S A Tech Software India IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The S A Tech Software India IPO opens on July 26, 2024 and closes on July 30, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of S A Tech Software India IPO?
faqs.answer: S A Tech Software India IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,18,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for S A Tech Software India IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in S A Tech Software India IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is S A Tech Software India IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for S A Tech Software India IPO will be done on Wednesday, July 31, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, August 1, 2024. Check the S A Tech Software India IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is S A Tech Software India IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The S A Tech Software India IPO listing date is on Friday, August 2, 2024.
